title: Effect of Cloud Cover on Air Pollutants

content.question: Air pollution from a power plant is being monitored for levels of nitrogen dioxide and ground-level ozone. The levels are measured daily at the same time. Which of the following best predicts the impact of a dark and cloudy day on the readings for the levels of air pollutants measured?

choices.label: There will be no change in the levels of nitrogen dioxide or ground-level ozone.
There will be a decrease in the level of nitrogen dioxide and an increase in the level of ground-level ozone.
There will be an increase in the levels of both nitrogen dioxide and ground-level ozone.
There will be an increase in the level of nitrogen dioxide and a decrease in the level of ground-level ozone.

content.answer: There will be an increase in the level of nitrogen dioxide and a decrease in the level of ground-level ozone.

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Identify a research method, design, and/or measure used.
